programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Phone: How Many Times?/ My Daughters Are Monsters
programme.desc: Josh believes that his fiancée, Jessica entertains men while he’s away on business.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Phone II
programme.desc: After four years of being together, Jeremiah questions whether their two kids are really his.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: 23 Years Later
programme.desc: After two decades of not knowing her Father, Hope was approached by a man named Tim at a gas station.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: You Cheated On Me; Dad, Take a Lie Detector Test!
programme.desc: Things got so toxic between Breanna and Michael that she used a stun gun on him; Eric Jr, believes that his father was an addict and an abusive con man who stole his $20,000 inheritance, which was reserved for his college education.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Give the Key Back!; Unlock: Broken Phone & Promises
programme.desc: Jackie Juicy's ex has the keys to her house, and her current fiancé isn't happy about it; Servilla thinks her boyfriend, I'Sun, is spending too much time trying to meet and sexting women instead of paying off the engagement ring he put on layaway.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: You Called The Cops On Me
programme.desc: On an all new Karamo, Naomi’s boyfriend, Jae, left her while she was two months pregnant because his family started rumors about him not being the father! The relationship is in a tailspin and has even escalated to domestic abuse.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Teens In Trouble
programme.desc: Ronesha is an aggrieved mother who claims that her daughter has been nothing but trouble since the pandemic.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The DNA Truth – Is That My Child? / Help, My Daughters Hate Me
programme.desc: Nyrita has a tumultuous relationship with her daughters. They claim their mother refuses any accountability.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Karamo, Help My Mom & Sister's Toxic Relationship
programme.desc: Taylor is a mother of four and is accused of being a terrible parent by her own mother Brenda!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA Mystery: I'm Pregnant ... April Fools?; You Deny Sex With Your Ex ... He's Here!
programme.desc: Nancy discovered that her boyfriend, Garry, was talking to a sex worker online and had a second phone hidden in the house; Nyasha says she wants her ex, Reggie, to step up and be a father to his child.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 1 Wife...1 Ex-Girlfriend...2 Babies...Is Glenn the Father?
programme.desc: Last time they were on MAURY, Leslie proved that Daniel was her baby’s father. Now they’re back to deny that Daniel fathered his ex-girlfriend Dina’s son. Then, Glenn denies that he’s the feather of his ex’s daughter and his own wife’s son!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'll Prove You're the Father of My 5 Kids!
programme.desc: Natasha is 100% sure that Vincent fathered her baby, but his mom says it’s a trap! Rachel knows Jake fathered her twin sons, but his fiancé Theresa will find out how many times he’s cheated with her! Is Troyinthian the father of Vanessa’s 5 kids?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Your Husband Is My Baby's Father…I'll Prove It!
programme.desc: Jasmine is positive that her ex-boyfriend Brian Is the father of her baby Jamiya. Brian is here with his mother Natalie and he's positive that Jasmine is barking up the wrong tree.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: The Sex Tape Will Prove You Cheated
programme.desc: Brandy divorced her husband because she thought she found the love of her life in Todd. But their love story is far from happy ever after. Then, Laurie and Tim are back because Laurie is convinced that Tim is now cheating on her with his ex.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Cheated With My Best Friend...Are Our 2 Kids His?
programme.desc: These guests are desperate for answers and Maury's DNA results are the only place they're going to find them. Will these moms finally find the fathers of their children? Or will their heartbreaking search continue?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Who's My Baby's Dad ... You or Your Little Brother?
programme.desc: Devon and her mother are here to make Brandon take responsibility for his child. But Brandon says that Devon and her mother are nothing but liars! Then, Dustin's here to find out if he or one of his two best friends are the father of Kaylin's baby.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Did My Best Friend Sleep With My Husband?
programme.desc: Accused cheaters face lie-detector tests. Jamie suspects husband cheated with best friend. Riko's girlfriend harbors a shocking secret. More tales of infidelity revealed.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 3 Men Tested…Which One of Them is my Baby's Father
programme.desc: 24 year old Melissa claims 47 year old Rob fathered her baby, but Rob’s daughter wants proof!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Know You Cheated on Me with Your Brother...Test them Both!
programme.desc: Tontalana married hotel chef Travis, but suspects he’s having sex with hotel guests! Then, is Latrenda having sex with her brother Seth? Plus, Tiffany ended her engagement to Charles because his exes keep harassing her! Is he done with his exes?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Got Me Pregnant at 13 … I'll prove You're The Dad
programme.desc: She says her baby is denied becacause the child was born with a major medical problem. Keith's new girlfriend also denies the baby. Then, Irene's love for Lupy turns to hate when he denied her baby, but her mother hated him from the start.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Don't Have 9 Kids ... The DNA Will Prove It!
programme.desc: Diana, Mark and Mark's mother Desiree are here to see if Mark's the father of Diana's baby. But when the results are revealed, will Desiree go on the warpath? Then, Shane swears he's not the father of Christina's baby.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Pain in the Gas
programme.desc: William and Marianne Lehman say they had a gas leak in their house and the defendant, a plumber, took terrible advantage of them and ripped them off. Brian says he was called out in an emergency situation to fix a gas leak on his off-hours, and explained his rates in detail to the plaintiffs. They agreed. Now a year later, they’re complaining and suing him? He’s accused of being a real pain the the gas.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Lied to the Police and Got Me Arrested!
programme.desc: Tavares Brown sues David Thompson for $5,000, claiming false accusations of pulling a gun got him arrested and cost him money. Thompson countersues for $5,000, insisting Brown threatened him with a gun.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Suspicious Texts
programme.desc: Anthony Franco sues Anabel Orellana De Ramirez for $334.50, claiming she agreed to pay for extra luggage charges he covered to bring items for her family. Anabel denies owing him, saying the suit is revenge for rejecting his romantic advances.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Scammed Me Into Taking Your Online Class
programme.desc: Shahbod Hosseini sues Rosie Dehghani for $1,300, claiming her pharmacy tech course was a scam. Rosie counters that Shahbod didn’t complete the work and owes her $700. She insists her program is legitimate, with students earning high-paying jobs.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: My Live-In Boyfriend Was Messing With My Sister
programme.desc: Cassandra sues her ex, Quentin, for $4,775, claiming he cheated with her sister, skipped out on rent, and stole furniture. Quentin denies owing anything, saying Cassandra is suing out of spite over his new relationship with her sister.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Ripped Off By A Clothing Designer
programme.desc: Alain has been brought to court for not finishing a custom outfit he says is because he was hospitalized.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Phone
programme.desc: It was love at first sight, but now Jesse and Ashley's relationship has been tumultuous for the past 8 years.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Too Many People in This Relationship
programme.desc: Ta’Laiya and De’Asia have been friends since the 7th grade and stopped speaking because over a damaged wig.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Help Us Co-Parent
programme.desc: Ollie says he confessed to his wife Angel about cheating on her. Now Ollie wants to unlock Angel’s phone.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Sisters At War...Is It Mom's Fault?
programme.desc: Ladonna is desperate to fix her relationship with her older sister Taunja once and for all.
